predicate.note: Frames file for 'divest' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: sometime without source
example.text: The adjustments result from the recently passed thrift-industry bailout legislation, which requires thrifts to divest all high-yield bond investments by 1994.

example.name: but usually with
example.text: The question of control could further hinder long-delayed plans for the government to divest itself of Philippine Airlines, in which it has a 99% stake.
example.arg: Philippine Airlines , in which it has a 99 % stake
